entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
